name: The Last Supper (Kayra Yorulmaz)
description:
Note: This game is multiplayer  (2 - 4 players) only and REQUIRES a LAN or local Wi-Fi (WLAN) connection

The Last Supper is a  3D Russian-roulette style survival  game where each player takes turns eating a piece of food from their dinner. 

Pieces can be of three types: empty, special, and poisonous. Empty scrolls exist to do nothing but fill you empty belly, whilst special pieces contain scrolls that may just give you an edge. Poison scrolls are the real threats, eat too many and you may see yourself looking at the gates of heaven themselves!

Each meal comes with three courses, a starter, main, and dessert course. Starters exist to give players an uneven start: having many empty and special pieces. Main is where the true competition begins, where the number of food pieces increase rather considerably. Finally, desserts are there to clean up whomever is left and decide who is the victor.
